normalized_poster.payload_xml: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?> <featuredAnimalPoster continent="North America"> <animal> <name>Bald Eagle</name> <image url="https://scontent-atl3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t1.6435-9/67748198_10157357630118609_2562051917387661312_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_s600x600&_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=13d280&_nc_ohc=ZYVxn56j3iIQ7kNvgGykUpm&_nc_zt=23&_nc_ht=scontent-atl3-2.xx&_nc_gid=AsB_0luaZmwm5T9ei03r1hf&oh=00_AYD01HhwQi_esVwvkYhq6lUPhB54yKbXeR5lSDaYwD4lkA&oe=674717BB" /> <description>Bald eagles are majestic white-headed raptors that soar above rivers and coasts. They spot fish with laser-sharp vision before diving at lightning speed to snatch their prey. These iconic birds remind us that clean water allows both wildlife and people to flourish.</description> </animal> </featuredAnimalPoster>
